mdRecord.dcterms:title: Yates Cemetery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located 125 yards behind 3996 Floyd Hwy. N on property owned by Marc & Kathryn Poole. Accessed by a long driveway serving several homes. 3996 is the first home on the left after several turns. N 36 59.250' W 89 12.604'
